hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Sa'eed said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'Wait for it to cool down before you pray, for intense heat is from the flaring up of the Hell-fire

chapter.ara-name: باب الإِبْرَادِ بِالظُّهْرِ فِي شِدَّةِ الْحَرِّ
chapter.eng-name: Waiting For It To Cool Down Before The Zuhr Prayer When The Heat Is Intense
